project.name: Zingle AI PR Reviewer
project.description: AI-driven data review and tagging assistant for enforcing governance, compliance, and consistency across data marts.

agents.name: PII Tagging Agent
agents.description: Detects personally identifiable information (PII) such as emails, phone numbers, and government IDs in data models.

agents.name: Domain Tagging Agent
agents.description: Automatically classifies datasets into business domains like Finance, HR, or Operations based on metadata and table context.

agents.name: Schema Validation Agent
agents.description: Checks schema conformance with company-wide standards â€” naming conventions, required fields, and data types.

agents.name: Data Lineage Agent
agents.description: Builds end-to-end lineage graphs to trace data flow from raw to aggregated layers.

agents.name: Policy Compliance Agent
agents.description: Validates access and ownership rules against the rulebook (e.g., Operations team cannot access Finance tables).

agents.name: Metric Standardization Agent
agents.description: Ensures consistent definitions for metrics like ARR, churn, and CAC across marts.

agents.name: Anomaly Detection Agent
agents.description: Detects irregular schema or data behavior (e.g., sudden column addition/removal).

agents.name: Data Quality Scoring Agent
agents.description: Evaluates datasets on completeness, conformity, and duplication to generate a quality score.
